title: IOCTL_STORAGE_MANAGE_DATA_SET_ATTRIBUTES (ntddstor.h)
description: This IOCTL_STORAGE_MANAGE_DATA_SET_ATTRIBUTES request is used to send a data set management request to a storage device.
